member.name: T:Metal.Weight.Calculator.RoundPipe
member.summary: Calculating the weight or length of a round pipe made of different metals (steel pipes, stainless steel, copper, etc.).

member.name: M:Metal.Weight.Calculator.RoundPipe.CalculateWeight(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculating the weight of a round pipe.
member.param: Density of the metal from which the round pipe is made in g/cm続.
member.returns: Weight of a round pipe in kg.

member.name: M:Metal.Weight.Calculator.RoundPipe.CalculateLength(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculating the length of a round pipe.
member.param: Density of the metal from which the round pipe is made in g/cm続.
member.returns: Lenght of a round pipe in millimetre.

member.name: T:Metal.Weight.Calculator.SquarePipe
member.summary: Calculating the weight or length of a square pipe made of different metals (steel pipes, stainless steel, copper, etc.).

member.name: M:Metal.Weight.Calculator.SquarePipe.CalculateWeight(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculating the weight of a square pipe.
member.param: Profile dimension or side size in millimetre.
Density of the metal from which the square pipe is made in g/cm続.
member.returns: Weight of a square pipe in kg.

member.name: M:Metal.Weight.Calculator.SquarePipe.CalculateLength(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculating the length of a square pipe.
member.param: Profile dimension or side size in millimetre.
Density of the metal from which the square pipe is made in g/cm続.
member.returns: Lenght of a square pipe in millimetre.
